gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 119, Hornets 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Hornets, 119-112, in OT. Coby White led the way with 27 points, 6 rebounds, and 5 assists for the Bulls, with Andre Drummond adding 21 points and 15 rebounds in the victory. Terry Rozier tallied 39 points, three rebounds, and eight assists for the Hornets in the loss. The Bulls improve to 17-21 in the regular season, while the Hornets fall to 8-26.
